item.description:
Lets's attend the free Nashua Thaetre Guild Performance.

Nashua Theatre Guild announces it's "Un"-Shakespeare in the Park 2008 production of Hamlet-"lite" with The 15 Minute Hamlet by Tom Stoppard followed immediately by Fortinbras by Lee Blessing.

These shows will be directed by SerahRose Roth and will take place in Greeley Park, Nashua as part of Nashua's SummerFUN! 2008.


The play starts at 2:00, but we need to be there by 1:30 to get good seats. You need to bring a lawn chair, bug spray and snacks as desired.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a foil balloon attached to my chair.
item.name: FAN Event: "Un"-Shakespeare in the Park
